title: Client won't open on Mac OSX 10.12.4
body:
I just played well until yesterday. 10 minutes ago I opened the client and had some trouble playing a game. I chose ranked game, chose both positions and the "find a game" button didn't show. After some time I managed to do it. I was 6min in queue, so I canceled it. But it was stuck there so I couldn't queue again.
I then decided to quit the client.
Now the client won't open. I click on it to open and the window's client doesn't appear. If I go to the "force quit" option, it doesn't show the League process.
What is happening?
Thank you.

replies.body: This can happen if your connection is struggling to reach our services, for example the patching or matchmaking servers.  You'll want to run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot any instability or blocks along the way.  I hope that helps, though let me know if you have any questions.  :D
It's the same for me and my friends. We're PC users though so it isn't OS related - probably Riot has problems with their servers.
Now it says "You can't open the application "League of Legends" because it may be damaged or incomplete.
